text: Thæ̂cring brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ ṣ̄rạthṭhā læ̂w pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā læ̂w ṣ̄rạthṭhā læ̂w pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā læ̂w pheìm kār pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā yìng k̄hụ̂n nận chı̀ ẁā xạllxḥˌ ca thrng xp̣hạythos̄ʹ h̄ı̂ kæ̀ phwk k̄heā k̆ h̄āmị̀ læa chı̀ ẁā phraxngkh̒ ca thrng næanả thāng dı h̄ı̂ kæ̀ phwk k̄heā k̆ h̄āmị̀
